episodes.title: Are You In a Cult? The Signs You’re Being Controlled
episodes.description:
Were you raised in a cult… without realizing it?

In this powerful episode of The Obelisk, I open up about my personal experience growing up in a religious cult—no robes, no compounds, just control hidden in plain sight. We explore what really defines a cult using the BITE Model (Behavior, Information, Thought, and Emotional control), and we ask the question many are afraid to face:

👉 Are you being controlled right now?

From the People's Temple under Jim Jones to the subtle tactics used in modern religious and ideological groups, this video breaks down the truth about cult dynamics, religious trauma, emotional manipulation, and how smart, curious people are often the easiest to trap.

🎯 Topics Covered:

What is a cult?

How to identify cult-like behavior

The BITE Model of cult control (Steven Hassan)

Famous cult examples (Jim Jones & Jonestown)

How cults separate families and control lives

Deconstruction, healing, and reclaiming your voice

⛓️ Religious trauma is real. Undue influence is powerful. But you are not alone.

📌 Share this with someone who needs it.
📚 Sources and support links in the pinned comment.
🔔 Subscribe and turn on notifications so you never miss a deep dive into heresy, history, and hidden truths.

02:07 - Section 2: The BITE Model Explained  
04:00 - Section 3: Famous Cults Overview  
04:22 - Section 4: The People's Temple Case Study  
05:29 - Section 5: Could You Be in a Cult?  
05:55 - Section 6: Psychological Effects & Sunken Cost Fallacy
